Binary Search

May 13, 2010 â€¢ {"login"=>"evlpanda", "email"=>"m.nitschke@gmail.com", "display_name"=>"Michael Nitschke", "first_name"=>"", "last_name"=>""}

Example of: 

Function BinarySearch(&arr, &srchVal, &low As integer, &high As integer) Returns integer
  
   If (&high < &low) Then
      Return - 1; /* not found */
   End-If;
  
   &mid = &low + ((&high - &low) / 2);
   If &arr [&mid] > &srchVal Then
      Return BinarySearch(&arr, &srchVal, &low, &mid - 1);
   Else
      If &arr [&mid] < &srchVal Then
         Return BinarySearch(&arr, &srchVal, &mid + 1, &high);
      Else
         Return &mid; /* found */
      End-If;
   End-If;
  
End-Function;
